metadata.title: Friday, 18th October, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what the nature of the contract signed by the University of Zambia and the developer, concerning the prime land belonging to the University of Zambia Great East Road Campus, is;
(b)    whether the land was advertised in the media prior to signing the contract;
(c)    what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d)    what the benefits to the University are.
(a)    when the Government will commence the fish restocking exercise in Luapula Province; and
(b)    how much the restocking exercise will cost.
(a)    how many tonnes of rice were produced by farmers in Chief Ntambu’s area in Mwinilunga Parliamentary Constituency in the 2012/2013 harvest season; and
(b)    how much of the rice at (a) was bought by the Food Reserve Agency.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs when the Government will provide a motor vehicle and other logistical support to Itemba Police Post in Senior Chief Milambo’s area in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency.
Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    when the construction of Mujila Mini-Hydropower Station in Mwinilunga District will be completed;
(b)    what the total cost of the project is; and
(c)    who the intended beneficiaries of the project are. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply - Motion (11th October) - Resumption of Debate.
